mapper.select: select rboard.no, rboard.user_no as userNo, rboard.title, users.name, rboard.content, rboard.hit, rboard.reg_date as regDate, rboard.group_no as groupNo, rboard.order_no as orderNo, rboard.depth from rboard, users where rboard.user_no = users.no order by group_no DESC, order_no ASC

select rboard.no, rboard.user_no as userNo, rboard.title, users.name, rboard.content, rboard.hit, rboard.reg_date as regDate, rboard.group_no as groupNo, rboard.order_no as orderNo, rboard.depth from rboard, users where rboard.user_no = users.no and rboard.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into rboard values (seq_rboard_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, default, sysdate, seq_rboard_no.currval, 1, 0)
insert into rboard values (seq_rboard_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, default, sysdate, #{groupNo}, #{orderNo}, #{depth})
